A toluene solution (3 mL) of diphenyl disulfide (59.4 mg, 0.272 mmol, 0.09 mM) was added dropwise to a toluene solution (14 mL) of (η 5-C 5H 5)Co(Im
i Pr 2)(PPh 3) ( 5; 293 mg, 0.544 mmol, 0.04 M), and the mixture was stirred at rt for 1 h. The volatiles were removed in vacuo, and the residue was recrystallized from a mixture of toluene/hexanes (1:10) to give 7 (91 mg, 87% yield) as an orange crystalline solid. μ eff: 1.73 μ B (calculated by Evans' method in CD 2Cl 2). Mp: 164.0 °C. 1H NMR (C 6D 6): δ 3.22 ppm (br), 11.54 ppm (br). HRMS (FAB) for C 20H 26CoS: [MH +] calculated 385.1143; found 385.1142.
